trustfund:
TF025306-PHRD-SOCIAL & FISCAL
            NATIONAL IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM,TF022900-SOCIAL SECTOR MANAGMENT TA PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Social Sector Management Technical
            Assistance Loan Project will assist the preparation and
            execution of reforms to improve the institutional and
            physical capacity to deliver social services to those who
            need them. Specifically the project will provide technical
            assistance to : (1) prepare and implement programs for
            improvements in resource allocation and utilization, cost
            recovery and targeting; (2) introduce administrative reforms
            and streamline processes in order to improve programming and
            budgeting of sectoral expenditures; (3) train federal and
            provincial sector managers; (4) build or strengthen
            information systems to support policy making and post
            evaluation capacity; and (5) put in place a better targeting
            system for the needy. Since the project is multisectoral, a
            coordinating unit will ensure that overall goals are
            reflected in the activities of each component. The loan will
            provide funds for consultant fees, training, vehicles,
            furniture and equipment, and civil works.
